dc.title: Papers of Lee De Forest 1884-1955
dc.creator: De Forest, Lee, 1873-1961
dc.description: Radio pioneer and inventor. Correspondence, diaries, technical notes and other material relating to Lee De Forest's inventions in radio and electronics and their effect in sound recording and transmission, efforts to exploit his discoveries through various business ventures, and his competition with Guglielmo Marconi in the field of wireless communication.
dc.subject: Electronics
Inventions
Preparatory schools
Radio
Sound--Recording and reproducing
Sound--Transmission
Wireless communication systems
